unnormalised: Arre yaar, heard about that case State vs. Sharma? Crazy stuff! Apparently, Sharma was booked under Sec. 307 of the IPC – attempt to murder. Police walas say he hit his neighbor with a danda after a fight over parking. FIR no. is 123/2024 filed at the local PS. Court date's set for 15/09/24. Let's see what happens, hope justice prevails!
normalised: Arre yaar, heard about that case State versus Sharma? Crazy stuff! Apparently, Sharma was booked under Section three hundred and seven of the I-P-C – attempt to murder. Police walas say he hit his neighbor with a danda after a fight over parking. F-I-R number is one hundred and twenty three slash two thousand and twenty four filed at the local P-S. Court date's set for fifteenth september two thousand and twenty four. Let's see what happens, hope justice prevails!
